actions.name: compose
actions.description: Open a new email draft in Airmail

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Enter the subject line for the new email message.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Enter the email address that you want to send the message from.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Enter the email addresses--separated by commas--for the To field of the new email message.

parameters.name: cc
parameters.description: Enter the email addresses--separated by commas--for the Cc field of the new email message.

parameters.name: bcc
parameters.description: Enter the email addresses--separated by commas--for the Bcc field of the new email message.

parameters.name: plainBody
parameters.description: Enter the content of your new email message in plain text.

parameters.name: htmlBody
parameters.description: Enter the content of your new email message in HTML.
